landing-intro-description: A versatile platform for building and running conversational chatbots without coding.
landing-support-description: By completing the form, our specialists will contact you and you can consult for free.
landing-cards-description-1: By building a chatbot with the help of Botinow and connecting it to your social network account, you can intelligently send messages to your customers and contacts and stay in touch with them around the clock.
landing-cards-description-2: With the help of Botinow, you can automatically send messages to people who follow a number for the first time and introduce your products or services to them exclusively
landing-cards-description-3: With the help of chatbot, many of the messages and questions that your contacts have are answered, and you don't need to spend the whole day answering direct messages.
landing-cards-description-4: Batino helps you respond to the requests of your contacts as quickly as possible. In fact, this will make your customers wait less and solve their problems quickly, and this will increase the satisfaction of your customers.
landing-footer-description: The purpose of Botinow is to help businesses grow, to make the communication process with their customers smarter, which will increase their sales, save time and money, and also make their customers more satisfied. Botinow is a platform that is very easy to work with and has a lot of features. It has connection and implementation on every page
